scripts.install:lambdas: npm run install:lambda:timeRecords && npm run install:lambda:projects && npm run install:lambda:profile && npm run install:lambda:tags
scripts.build:lambdas: npm run build:lambda:timeRecords && npm run build:lambda:projects && npm run build:lambda:profile && npm run build:lambda:tags
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:lambdas
scripts.clean:lambdas: npm run clean:lambda:timeRecords && npm run clean:lambda:projects && npm run clean:lambda:profile && npm run clean:lambda:tags
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:lambdas
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:all && cdk deploy --context stage=dev
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:all && cdk deploy --context stage=prod
scripts.deploy:oidc: npm run build && cdk deploy --app 'node dist/bin/github-oidc.js'
scripts.synth:oidc: npm run build && cdk synth --app 'node dist/bin/github-oidc.js'
scripts.diff:oidc: npm run build && cdk diff --app 'node dist/bin/github-oidc.js'
